NakedPlayer_02: It takes all kinds, I guess.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>How goes it, Link? Getting dark out here,
isn't it?
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>How goes it, Link? You're out pretty late,
you know!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>What are you doing out in the rain? Go
inside before you get hit by lightning!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>All these Gerudo are really making my
heart race.

It's amazing that they're here. Only you
could have inspired an entire people to
spring into action... You or the princess.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>Speaking of which, I can't believe she's still in
that dangerous <clr:0000>area under Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Aah! Mind, stop wandering! I have
guarding to do!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I hope you take some time to see the
extra facilities we have in here. They're
very helpful.
As for us, we'll keep watch over <clr:0000>Lookout
Landing<clr:ffff> until we have both you and the
princess back safe and sound.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Link, look!<sp:0:4:0>You see those Gerudo? They're here to
defend Lookout Landing with us.<sp:0:4:0>Gerudo soldiers are the best of the best.
With them on our side, we'll have no
problem keeping this place safe!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link! <sp:5:0:0>Did you hear that rumor about
Princess Zelda?<sp:0:4:0>They're saying she was spotted at
Hyrule Castle.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>The Gerudo heard about what happened
and came to support us. Isn't that great?

They're going to help protect <clr:0000>Lookout
Landing <clr:ffff>from now on.

I know I'm not as impressive as them, but
don't forget about me!
BlackZelda_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>We've been trying to spot her, but so far,
no luck.<sp:0:4:0>You might be able to see something
with <clr:0000>Purah's telescope<clr:ffff> though...
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Link! At last you come talk to me!<sp:0:4:0>This whole time, I never stopped keeping
my eye out for you.
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's a rumor going around that
Princess Zelda was spotted at
Hyrule Castle.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Link, you're here! We've all been hoping
that you'd return!<sp:0:4:0>I've watched for any sign of you this
whole time!
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>By the way, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Did you hear that rumor
about Princess Zelda?<sp:0:4:0>They're saying she was spotted at
Hyrule Castle.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I'm sure Purah is glad to have you
back, Link.

Now we'll bring Princess Zelda back, too,
<sp:5:0:0>whatever it takes!
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The monsters may thin out a bit after
daybreak, but that's no reason to let
your guard down.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is the time of night when monsters
come out. Be safe out there.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Looks like rain, I'm afraid. We might be in
for lightning strikes.

Watch out. You don't want to be holding
anything that's made of metal.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Angry_00>Last that anyone saw of either you or
<clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff> was when you went to
investigate the gloom...
And then the castle rose into the sky, and
everyone's been so worried about what
happened to you both!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> has nearly worn herself out trying
to figure out where you two went.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's almost that time of night when
monsters come out. Be safe out there.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Purah is working in that large <clr:0000>building
over there<clr:ffff>.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>We'll put everything we've got into things
here, Link.

Anything we can do to support you and
Purah in finding the princess, <sp:5:0:0>we'll do it!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Please, report to her right away! She'll
want to know you're all right.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Right after Hyrule Castle rose into
the sky, no one could find you or
the princess.<sp:0:4:0>When news of your disappearance made
its way here to <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Well...<sp:5:0:0>I heard <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> went into a
serious panic.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_01>I'll never forget that awful day when you
two disappeared and no one could
find you.<sp:0:4:0>The way Purah went into a serious panic...<sp:5:0:0>
Well, it's the same way we've all felt
at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing <clr:ffff>since then.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>This place is known as Lookout Landing.


When the <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff> began to seep up from
under Hyrule Castle, <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> started
observing it from here.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But now we're all here looking out for
any signs of Princess Zelda. The whole
effort is coordinated from this place.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hope you take some time to see the
extra facilities that are available in here.
You'll find them very helpful.
As for us, we'll keep watch over <clr:0000>Lookout
Landing<clr:ffff> until we have both you and the
princess back safe and sound.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>We don't see a lot of monsters right
around here, but we do have two of
those strange <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff> nearby.
One's <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> of here. The other's off to
the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Purah is in that <clr:0000>building over there<clr:ffff>.
Please, report to her right away. She'll
want to know you're safe.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>All the Gerudo here at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>...
They came because of you.

You inspired an entire people to spring
into action. Not many can do that.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Though I know someone else who doesâ€”
Princess Zelda. *sigh*

Where do you think she is? Still in that
dangerous <clr:0000>area under Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>L-Link, you're here! We've all been hoping
that you'd return!
